sourcesContent:
Account Settings - Profile

Profile Billing Security Notifications
Profile Picture
User image name is required. User image must be png, jpeg, jpg, gif, webp. User image must be no larger than 5 MB.
Account Details
User name is required. User name must be at least 12 character long. User name must be no more than 25 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "Ã±" and "Ã±" are allowed.
First name is required. First name must be at least 4 character long. First name must be no more than 25 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "Ã±" and "Ã±" are allowed.
Last name is required. Last name must be at least 4 character long. Last name must be no more than 25 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "Ã±" and "Ã±" are allowed.
organization name is required. organization name must be at least 4 character long. organization name must be no more than 25 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "Ã±" and "Ã±" are allowed.
Email address is required. Must be a valid email address.
Country address is required.
State address is required.
Phone number is required. Must be a valid phone number.
Phone number is required. Must be a valid date.
Role is required.
Identification is required. Must be a valid identification.
additional info is required. additional info must be at least 10 character long. additional info must be no more than 50 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "Ã±" and "Ã±" are allowed.
